name: FreshRSS
short_description: Self-hosted RSS feed aggregator for reading news and updates from multiple sources.
description: Self-hosted RSS feed aggregator for reading news and updates from multiple sources. FreshRSS is a self-hosted application focused on feed, productivity, rss, news. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host FreshRSS on your home server to self-hosted rss feed aggregator for reading news and updates from multiple sources without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use FreshRSS to manage your feed workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
